Redcarpetup.sub-heading: A YCombinator '15 and Google launchpad startup. Provides instant credit to students by creating a credit score for them.
summary: Worked on spreadsheet based order management system built with React on Node using Redux and Handsontable. Being in charge of OMS, I was responsible to coordinate with operations and marketing dept. and resolve their daily issues.
Also created RESTful APIs for OMS and mobile app. Refactored and fixed multitude of bugs in both OMS and API server.

Cleansweep.sub-heading: A volunteer management system for Aam Adami Party.
summary: Started by veteran programmer Anand Chitipothu, Cleansweep tracks and manages the activities of party volunteers across all polling booths, polling stations, wards, assembly constituencies, districts and states.
I've been an active developer of cleansweep since Sep '15. I helped scrape GBs of electoral data, build APIs, SMS Bridge and many more things.

SubFinder.sub-heading: Download subtitles for your movie files.
summary: SubFinder lets you find accurate subtitle along with movie details for your video files. Subtitles which were made just for your file. Best part? Your file name doesn't matter.
It calculates a special hash which is unique for every file. The hash then gets checked for subtitle and other details in the database.
A beautiful web interface for services offered by OpenSubtitles API.

Relation Finder.sub-heading: Find your relation with your relatives.
summary: Has it ever happened when some random aunty comes to you in a wedding and asks Beta, do you remember me? You know her but don't know how she's related.
Indian relationships are complicated. This is my attempt to save you from embarrassment.
Capable of processing tricky queries, thanks to Prolog, this is something I'm really proud of.
A simple e-commerce website written purely in Java Servlets/JSP.
Features more than 1,000 books along with their user reviews in 100+ cateogries, scraped from Amazon*.
This was made for my final year project.
* The data was scarped just for learning purpose and to make it look interesting. It's not open sourced.

Runescape Hiscores.sub-heading: A hiscores app for Runescape Private Servers.
summary: RuneScape is a fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) developed and published by Jagex, released originally in January 2001.
This is a hiscores (player scoreboard) application written using Django for Runescape Private Servers (RSPS).
Being a part of both Runescape and RSPS communities I've made and been with several Runescape private servers.
